name: inProperty.com
tag_list: real-estate-management-software, real-estate-crm-software, property-management-software, crm-for-real-estate, real-estate-customer-relationship-management, lead-nurturing-software, lead-management-software, sales-lead-tracking-software, lead-generation-so
overview:
inProperty.com is a real estate solution provider company that specializes in providing CRM, real estate software solutions, lead nurturing solutions, event management for builders, developers and agents. Our solutions are engineered to cater the real estate industry. We are one of the No. 1 providers of Real Estate Management software solutions. At inProperty.com we believe in offering high-class solutions to the developers and agents. Our specialized solutions are designed to automate all business processes and enhance performance by providing utmost assistance to the agents and property dealers.

Our software combines a powerful and advanced CRM with Sales Automation tools with the flexibility of a cloud based platform. Developers and builders can have the freedom to optimize sales and grow revenue, whether you’re in the office or on the move. Our Lead Nurturing system enables developers and builders to take a general website inquiry and nurture that through to a sales inquiry using a series of email campaigns designed to engage and educate the client to the buying stage.

external_links.title: Prominence of Real Estate Software Solutions
